channel.title: Ps on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Ps on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Return just PID of script with 'ps' and 'awk'
item.description: Today I ran into an issue where I am running a python script that I needed to get the process ID (PID) of, but that the process was being output with a space between ‘python’ and the actual script name (in this case, jiraircbot.py). I’m sure it’s totally overkill and there is a much easier way I didn’t find to do this, but after some scouring of The Google, I found something that works!
